Description:
Detects the removal of system firewall rules. Adversaries may only delete or modify a specific system firewall rule to bypass controls limiting network usage or access.
Detection rules that match only on the disabling of firewalls will miss this.


Author: IAI
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Modify System Firewall
Query: sourcetype='linux-auditd' eql select * from _source_ where ((type = 'execve' and a0 = 'iptables' and a1 like '%drop%') or (type = 'execve' and a0 = 'firewall-cmd' and a1 like '%remove%') or (type = 'execve' and a0 = 'ufw' and a1 like '%delete%'))
